resources.string: Could not open Google Play, please install the Google Play app.

string-array.name: frases
string-array.item: 7 billion people in the world… and none of them asked for your opinion.
What goes around comes around, honey…
Subject: Tidal. Reaction: Pff.
I give 0 fucks to your opinion.
God doesn\'t care for your sexual life.
I got more important things than stay here listening you shit through your mouth.
Beatles didn\'t invent Rock \'n Roll.
The struggle is real.
Is not personal, is drag.
The Pop scene is not a monarchy, Madonna is not a queen, Britney is not a princess.
Opinions are like assholes: Some people use it to crap all over everything they see.
Trixie shouldn\'t have left.
You can only judge people from watching soap operas if you read an entire philosophy book today.
You have to love people despite the people.
Blue and black
White and gold
No one cares.
If you like Iggy Azaela: leave my app, now.
Stop it, just stop it!.
Honey, don\'t.
Stop trying to make your life happen. It\'s not gonna happen.
Do you even go here?
uhum, yeah, right.
\"I\'m a good person, but when i get angry… get out of the way\". Wow, you are so unique and different, congratulations, i\'m so scared.
Life is Destiny Child, you are Michelle
I don\'t envy you, I envy Beyoncé.
You are so pretty when no one is looking at you.
Life is underwear trying to go up your ass.
You are not better than anyone because you like rock \'n roll.
You are not better than anyone because you like jazz.
There is more to life than your pop diva.
You are not smart, you just have a internet connection.
Remember that embarrassing thing you did a long time ago? Well, everyone else remembers.
Stop liking your favourite band if it became famous.
She is under no obligation to like you.
You are the apotheosis of \"No one is perfect\".
No one cares about your new phone, stop it.
The struggle is real.
\"Am i the only one here who…\" No, you are not, you self-righteous shithead.
If my friends were as boring as yours I would also spend the whole evening looking at my phone instead of talking to them.
This app is shit.
Another illustrator making some sci-fi/realistic/hype/etc version of Disney princess, hooray ¬¬
Pizza is not a food group.
Cell phones are making people more anti-soc…zzzzzzzz
6 seasons and a movie
Being anti-SJ is so 2011.
Of course that what\'s inside that matters…
Have you heard the news? No one loves you.
Beyoncé should have won.
I\'ma let you finish, but everyone else is better.
Self-help?! If you can\'t help others imagine helping yourself, a tragic case of a sad little life.
Working 5 days a week to have 2 \"free\" days, what a Golden Age, hum?
Monday is not a bad day, is your work that sucks.
Thought one of your new years resolution was to stop others from treating you like trash. Well, guess i was wrong.
9gag?! what year are we in?! Is this the past?!
Everybody has a weakness. Yours is your life.
You deserve a high-five. in the face. with a chair.
Maybe the reason they didn\'t answer your message was because they were busy doing something better.
Maybe the reason they didn\'t answer your message was because they didn\'t see it, stop being paranoid.
Having a college degree doesn\'t make you a better person.
The one thing worst than gay people is straight people.
Wow, cool hum, congratulations.
Yeah, seems legit.
I don\'t know what is more sad, your self esteem or your bank account.
Diarrhea Apocalypse is an awesome name for a band.
Banks are evil.
Time don\'t give a shit to you.
You could… you know… stop being lazy and all.
\"Likes\" are different than love.
Being intelligent, but lazy, is such an easy excuse.
Motivational quotes are not philosophy.
Do you ever get tired of being so obvious
Love is not possession.
Such a lovely day for you to ruin it with your face.
Bad-mood is not an excuse to be a dick.
There is no problem with liking superficial things. There is a problem with being superficial.
If people could learn from their mistakes than you would be a Doctor.
Wanna know who asked about you? yes, no one!
Don\'t confuse a \"hi\" with me liking you. \'Cause i really don\'t.
Game Of Thrones: cable soap opera.
God have installed Baidu in you.
Katia shouldn\'t have left
People that justify being an asshole using zodiac signs…pff
Villains don\'t exist. Everyone thinks their are totally justified in their actions while being an ass
Glee\'s version is not better.

resources.string: Suggestion sent! Now go on with you sad little life.
There was a problem sending the suggestion. It was probably you, not us.
I bet you didn\'t pay the internet
No one wants a blank suggestion ¬¬
You can\'t even type your e-mail right?
- New \"Suggest\" option in the menu. Suggest us new cool phrases, or not, whatever, like i care.\n\n - New phrases.
